description: Troy Daniels returns to NK with an 0:1 record. He has been training hard for this match and is determined to walk away with a win. His opponent is newcomer to NK, Sami Damo. Sami is a bad ass from NYC and is very cocky. He feels that his experience on the streets of NYC is all he will need to carry him to his first win. Troy has a solid strategy to use his height to pin his opponent and dominate him, but Sami feels that his short stature can only help him in bringing down Troy. They both are determined to make the other one be their bitch for the day. Someone is going down hard this week and will, undoubtedly, be humiliated and end up worshiping some cock.
title: Troy Daniels vs Sami Damo The Oil Match
